name: yaren
description: 牙人委托发布与查看应用（便携版）

scripts.build: npm run prepackage && npm run clean-dist && electron-builder --config fixed-portable-config.js
scripts.build-new: npm run prepackage && npm run clean-dist-new && electron-builder --config portable-config.js
scripts.build-frameless: npm run prepackage && npm run clean-dist-frameless && electron-builder --config frameless-portable-config.js
scripts.build-final: npm run prepackage && npm run clean-dist-final && electron-builder --config final-portable-config.js
scripts.build-inline: npm run prepackage && npm run clean-dist-inline && electron-builder --config inline-uuid-config.js
scripts.build-unpacked: npm run prepackage && npm run clean-dist && electron-builder --config fixed-portable-config.js --dir
scripts.release: npm run prepackage && npm run build && electron-builder --publish never --config fixed-portable-config.js

author: fayufm
